articles.author: Debkalpa Banerjee
articles.title: UEFA Euro 2020: Denmark show heart, spirit in a tournament filled with hurdles - The Indian Express
articles.description: Powered by a resolve to lift the trophy for Christian Eriksen, Denmark ended a long wait of 29 years at the European Championships by reaching the semi-finals for the first time since 1992.
